title: Error 183: Failed to Create Dump File
body: This error has been more of a problem recently since it has happened about half the time. This error usually comes up during a Champ Select and it would pop up and instantly close my game. If I try to reopen my League, it would take me back to the Lobby and let me queue and acted as if I dodged with no penalty. I have never had this issue Ingame, but only in a Champ Select. I would like some help and a fix if possible please.

replies.body: Whats the point of this free win in your series if this fucking bug gives a free loss running a Radeon 6670 {{champion:67}}  happened during this chicks champ select another dodge another climb to gold. Its hard enough trying to get people to cooperate and play towards your team comps winning conditions. What does it TAKE RIOT. This new client crashes unexpectedly not due to outdated comps not due to internet connectivity its a bug within all the pretty animations of champ select. plain and simple doesn't happen during banning but when someone selects a champ and the pretty splash art gets shown. in 6 games its happened 3 times. luckily i wasn't 1st pick or second. I'm not even mad. I'm DISAPPOINTED. the old client worked it wasn't pretty but it worked. but I've been playing long before this game was pretty so I just want it to work like it used to.
truth^^

I HAVE THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM!!!!! It literally kicks me out of champ select and then take me back to the lobby and then i have to wait my dodge queue timer. i though i was the only one with this problem

I have the same problem , and seems like a lot of people do and nothing is being solved , please at least remove the leaver buster queue .
the client crashes every 5 or 4 games during champ select (window freezes, pop up notification " error 183 " , and when the window comes back alive I'm back at lobby with queue ) 
this issue seems to be occurring for a while , please look into it 
**thanks**

Google sent me here


Don't You Do anything About This Bug?


So Many players had the Same issue


it just gave me another headache


{{champion:35}} : Shame on You
thanks riot for this punishment  half hour for this error 183{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

The failed to create a dump file can happen when bugsplat fails to gather logs for your crash.  Your specific issue though might be a network problem that lost connection to champion select.  Your best bet would be to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  You can test it out in a custom game as well to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you run into any problems.

I'm having the same issue as well. Luckily when I click "okay" on the popup message with the error the client loads right back up on its own and takes me right back to select. Takes about 20 seconds, so as long as it's not my turn to ban/lock in I'm okay. I know it's not a network connection issue. It happens maybe every 4-5 champ selects for me.

But, I am worried that this will eventually turn into something worse or it will be my turn to select or ban and I'll get a leavebuster warning. Please fix this issue! This did not happen until the current patch. I repaired client, reinstalled, etc. Nothing fixes it.

Thanks.

Edit: I want to reiterate it is NOT connection issues. following that guide does nothing to fix this issue. Please look into it more.

Well its been happening to me to but not in champ Select but now its been doing it in champ select. First time i got it in champ select (it freezes client) i had to go to task manager to close client then when i logged on it reconnected me to the champ select problem was i could see any champion so because i could pick anything i was kicked, and second time i happen just as i was banning and i could ban so i got kick and both times i got a penalty... currently waiting 28 min because some random file dump thing that showed up this month is trolling me. Riot its not me, its you please help us out and fix this asap{{item:3070}}
I have this issue randomly as well and i dont have connection issues ever. I never lag in game nor do i ever receive ping spikes or latency.
Please remove leaverbuster...

I'm having this issue now as well. Pretty sure it never happened before 7.4. All of a sudden 7.5 and 7.6 it starts happening a lot. Usually after repeated queues and remakes cause of other people dodging. Can we PLEASE get some attention on this issue. Leave busting my balls.

More info: Error doesn't occur right away in champ select. It errors when it is my turn to ban or pick, whichever comes first. Crashes out, and sometimes the process (not the client) remains running in the background. Twice when I reopened client I had 2 identical, synced windows. Have been deleting processes after errors now, and the duplicate does not happen.
Exact same issue with no internet disconnection at all
Okay thanks! I have been getting some very high random ping spikes like around 800+ just randomly
I have a got the same prob but in euw server and im sure isn't my connection maybe the luncheur ...

It's this client. Never had these problems when the legacy was still around. Even with the legacy up and using the new client, I would keep getting this error. Really irritating, fix your broken client Riot.
happens to me 4-5 times a day, only solution is to close launcher after every game and restart, please help us here!!!
I just got a queue dodge timer for the same issue...

yep. happening to me too here in oce. It's not my connection. everything runs fine. Riot blaming peoples net when the spike of this is coming from this recent patch...please just be honest. you f'd up this patch

I hate this new fancy looking client. It had eaten my elo for months since that patch. The crash happens at almost every single champion selection and It really drives me crazy!!!  RITO plz fix this A S A P !!!!{{summoner:3}}
This has been happening to me more recently too.  They always blame everything else but their crappy programs and I KNOW it's not my damn connection.  I have MediaCom and am in Iowa.  FIX YO SHIZ!!!

some to me. connection is very fine, i test this on a totally clean installation of windows, with most of services that use hard disk drive stopped.

The only solution i found is to select a champ, not use chat or any key (just mouse), click on confirm, let the error come out, wait for the client re-launch and come back in game in time for have no ban (i taken 3 ban 5-15- etc).
How To Fix This Riot ? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Does anyone know how to fix this. It happens every time :(
Same for me! I hate this client!!!!!!
I've been dodging at least 2 times every 5 games for the past 4 months fix your game...
It has been happening for me for 2 months now, I had a conversation with the support, and bothing they said helped. It only happens after the bans, when you can select your champion.

The sad thing is that the "support specialists" don't even read what you write. They just see the thread and copypaste the same "bro did you check your internet" bullshit. Like they care anymore, two years ago a problem like this would have been wiped off within minutes, but now they're too busy counting skins money to even care about your game experience. Think about it, how much time has passed since the last time you saw the yellow warning sign pop out with developers' log? I know right.

Well. Same problem here in EUW mainly for 1 of my 3 computer. Error183 can imho be resolved with admin-rights [then it is "only" an error/crash with filedump - error 183 is only a failed permisson for writing the dump].


Main difference of the computer on wich client fails is that it is a Win7 32bit as the other 2 are Win7 64bit. Perhaps others here have the same system (32bit)? Would be a chance of isolating the problem.

i have thefcking same problem
{{champion:36}}

Pretty much over this! So many people have the same problem and still no fix for the one problem. I have had so many 30 minute dodge ques its unreal! I'm almost tempted to just stop playing man so annoying. The game is supposed to be fun not full of head aches.

Guys PLEASE TRY THIS.

1. Click the "setting" option next to the "cross".
2. Then Click on full initiate.

The process will take a little while but it will remove all errors and corrupted files. 

Thank You

where is the setting next to the cross u mean tho
How to solve this problem :(
This happens to me in about 1/2 my champ selects now.  Client freezes in champ select.  Not an internet issue i have a direct connection.

Same !
{{item:3070}}
Delete file Leaguegeclient.exe in main folder. Worked for me
bump, exactly the same thing happened to me during champ select

twice now ive lost my promos because of this crash.  this is a real issue and its getting old and riots only response to any client crashed is oh maybe theres a kink in your WIRED connection cutting off the flow of electricity.  this has only happened to me in ranked games on my promos. like the others have said its not us its you.
same issue error dump file 183 during quene and champ select. No internet disconnection and i cleaned my cache and cookies.
Another "dump file" error and I didn't get to select my Champion, so now I'm sitting out with LEAVERBUSTER BULLSHIT.  OMG - fix your damn coding, you fools.
Happened to me too, it IS NOT INTERNET
Happened again.  OMG - fix your damn game.  There are TOO MANY reports for it to be US.  Just accept that it's YOU and FIX IT.
Happened again.  ...and the count grows.  FIX YOUR SHIT!!!!
if you have nvidia cards update the driver, did the update today and didnt have any crashes
